H.industrial_ru: Ammonia production, oil refining, hydrogen energy.
H.production_ru: Steam methane reforming or water electrolysis.
H.abundance_ru: The most abundant element in the Universe (75% by mass).
fun_facts_ru: The lightest element in the periodic table.
Hydrogen is the main fuel of stars, including the Sun.
The H₂ molecule is the smallest of all diatomic molecules.

He.industrial_ru: Cryogenics, inert atmosphere for welding, filling balloons.
He.abundance_ru: Second most abundant element in the Universe.
hazards_ru: Can cause asphyxiation in enclosed spaces
fun_facts_ru: Named after the Greek sun god Helios.
Helium was first discovered in the solar spectrum, not on Earth.
Helium-II is a superfluid near absolute zero.
